Text:
@Riders_TPB:
You can compute it for yourself.
6720 MB / 5288 seconds = 1.2708 MB/s (byterate) = 10.1664 Mb/s (total bitrate)
10.1664 Mb/s - 1.509 Mb/s (audio bitrate) = 8.6574 Mb/s (video bitrate)
Or you could just use MediaInfo, like I do. ;) I've converted about half of my 400 movies using that method of finding out the bitrate :P
